casebody.data:
EVERSON
v.
WRIGHT. No. 146P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006.

David K. Everson, Pro Se.

Douglas E. Wright, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff for Rehearing En Banc:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
